item.title: ‘Palestine 36’ Review: The Country’s Epic Oscar Submission Offers a Sweeping View of a Tumultuous Time
item.description: “Prescient” is perhaps the most appropriate word to describe “Palestine 36.” As the whole world focuses on Gaza, a film about the history of the conflict in the Middle East could not be more timely. H
